name: Proof 378 — One Meal for the Entire Day
description:
On December 23, 2025 at 11:21 ICT, this image records the only meal consumed by P’Toh for the entire day at MaMeeFarm.

No break schedule.
No guaranteed meals.
No external support.

This is not a story of sacrifice for sympathy 
it is a factual record of how work continues even when basic needs are reduced to the minimum.

This proof documents nutritional reality under constrained conditions,
captured as-is, without staging, in alignment with DGCP ground-truth principles.

DGCP Classification

Proof-of-Life

Proof-of-Survival

Proof-of-Continuity

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
